shots.narrative: Ever felt that rush after clicking 'Buy Now,' only to be hit with regret moments later? Or maybe you've promised yourself, 'This is the last time'-but it never is.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Establish connection and relate to common experiences
a_roll.shot_description: Host faces camera, soft empathetic eye contact, gentle tone

b_roll.shot_purpose: Visually establish shopping compulsion and regret cycle
b_roll.shot_description: Quick cuts: online shopping, smiles fading into frowns, people hiding bags
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Tight shots of clicks, delivery arrivals, face transitions from joy to regret

shot_data.narration_text: Ever felt that rush after clicking 'Buy Now,' only to be hit with regret moments later? Or maybe you've promised yourself, 'This is the last time'-but it never is.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter introduction would break immersion. B-roll better illustrates emotions.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Montage quickly conveys internal struggles and relational tension visually.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Presenter introduction would break immersion. B-roll better illustrates emotions.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Montage quickly conveys internal struggles and relational tension visually.

shots.narrative: Sometimes, the ripple effect of these struggles quietly touches the people you love, creating stress and distance without you even realizing it.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Acknowledge broader personal impacts for relatability
a_roll.shot_description: Host shifts tone, addresses unseen tension empathetically

b_roll.shot_notes: Actors keep expressions understated; natural light.
b_roll.shot_description: Couple sits across table, worried looks, bills between them, body language tense
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Hands on bills, distant gazes, subtle distancing cues

shot_data.narration_text: Sometimes, the ripple effect of these struggles quietly touches the people you love, creating stress and distance without you even realizing it.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Internal struggles are better shown than told. Presenter less impactful here.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Visuals of credit card stress and couple tension reinforce emotional consequences.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Internal struggles are better shown than told. Presenter less impactful here.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Visuals of credit card stress and couple tension reinforce emotional consequences.

shots.narrative: You're not alone. And it's not your fault. There is hope for healing-for you, and for the relationships that matter most.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Instill hope and mitigate viewer shame early
a_roll.shot_description: Host delivers comfort, soft smile, open body language to camera

b_roll.shot_notes: Stat overlays remain readable; modern style.
b_roll.shot_purpose: Visualize scale of issue; reduce viewer isolation
b_roll.shot_description: Animated infographic: silhouettes show prevalence, key stats fade in
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Flowing data overlays, diverse faces highlighted, number counters animate smoothly

shot_data.narration_text: You're not alone. And it's not your fault. There is hope for healing-for you, and for the relationships that matter most.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating empathy could feel repetitive. Visual data strengthens message.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Infographic gives tangible scope, supports narrator's reassurance.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating empathy could feel repetitive. Visual data strengthens message.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Infographic gives tangible scope, supports narrator's reassurance.

shots.narrative: Hi, I'm Dr. Leslie Davis. For over 20 years, I've helped people break free from compulsive behaviors-especially the kind that silently drain your finances, strain your relationships, and steal your peace of mind.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Build credibility and initial rapport with viewers
a_roll.shot_description: Warm close-up, Dr. Leslie smiles to camera, gentle hand gesture

b_roll.shot_purpose: Visually back up Dr. Leslieâ€™s expertise
b_roll.shot_description: Still images: certificates, Dr. Leslie with clients, thank-you notes overlays
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Framed diplomas, handshake shots, welcoming office decor

shot_data.narration_text: Hi, I'm Dr. Leslie Davis. For over 20 years, I've helped people break free from compulsive behaviors-especially the kind that silently drain your finances, strain your relationships, and steal your peace of mind.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Personal, expert intro best delivered face-to-face for credibility.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Could use photo montage but less trust-building than direct address.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Personal, expert intro best delivered face-to-face for credibility.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Could use photo montage but less trust-building than direct address.

shots.narrative: Shopping addiction isn't just about money. It's about the emotional triggers, the stress, the 'quick fix' that turns into long-term regret. But here's the good news: You can take back control-and I can show you how.

a_roll.shot_notes: Cut to a comforting smile on 'good news.'
a_roll.shot_purpose: Educate on deeper causes and offer hope
a_roll.shot_description: Medium shot, Dr. Leslie empathetic, slight emphasis on key phrases

b_roll.shot_purpose: Visualize emotional roots and prospects for change
b_roll.shot_description: Animated graphics: emotion icons (stress, regret) cycle with currency signs
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Icons for triggers, animated quick-fix loop, hopeful spark at 'take back control'

shot_data.narration_text: Shopping addiction isn't just about money. It's about the emotional triggers, the stress, the 'quick fix' that turns into long-term regret. But here's the good news: You can take back control-and I can show you how.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter explains emotional underpinnings with empathy and clarity.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Abstract visuals possible, but core info best from expert directly.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Presenter explains emotional underpinnings with empathy and clarity.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Abstract visuals possible, but core info best from expert directly.

shots.narrative: That's why I created Retail Therapy Unplugged-a proven coaching program designed to help you break the cycle of compulsive spending. This isn't another cookie-cutter budgeting course. It's a science-backed approach with practical, evidence-based techniques inspired by psychology and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, that will help you regain control and build a future you are proud of.

a_roll.shot_description: Presenter gestures to highlight programâ€™s uniqueness, confident posture

b_roll.shot_purpose: Show smart, personalized, scientific program features
b_roll.shot_description: Fast-cut: coaching call, open workbook, shown techniques, CBT keyword overlays
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Hands on workbook, psychology icons, group video session, science badge graphic

shot_data.narration_text: That's why I created Retail Therapy Unplugged-a proven coaching program designed to help you break the cycle of compulsive spending. This isn't another cookie-cutter budgeting course. It's a science-backed approach with practical, evidence-based techniques inspired by psychology and Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, that will help you regain control and build a future you are proud of.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Listing features less engaging directly from presenter.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: B-roll/montage illustrates coaching, evidence-based methods, client optimism.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Listing features less engaging directly from presenter.
shots.rationale_b_roll: B-roll/montage illustrates coaching, evidence-based methods, client optimism.

shots.narrative: We don't just focus on what you spend-we uncover why you spend, and how to build lasting habits that lead to financial freedom.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Highlight focus on habits and deeper change
a_roll.shot_description: Host sincere, softens tone to stress unique approach

b_roll.shot_notes: Montage ends on a positive note.
b_roll.shot_description: Clients smiling, celebrating milestones, gratitude note overlays
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Handwritten thank-yous, relieved faces, high-five, digital 'progress' bars

shot_data.narration_text: We don't just focus on what you spend-we uncover why you spend, and how to build lasting habits that lead to financial freedom.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating details feels redundant. Visuals emphasize transformation.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Montage powerfully shows client breakthroughs and emotional authenticity.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Presenter repeating details feels redundant. Visuals emphasize transformation.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Montage powerfully shows client breakthroughs and emotional authenticity.

shots.narrative: Imagine waking up without that knot of anxiety about your spending. That's the transformation we aim for with our top-tier program: Personalized Transformation Coaching.

a_roll.shot_notes: Host uses slower pacing for impact.
a_roll.shot_purpose: Set aspirational goal and emotional stakes
a_roll.shot_description: Host, gentle confidence, calm demeanor, speaks about transformation

b_roll.shot_purpose: Show peace that follows relief from compulsion
b_roll.shot_description: Soft-lit shot: peaceful person with coffee, journaling by window
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Morning routine, sunlight, relaxed body language, notebook pages

shot_data.narration_text: Imagine waking up without that knot of anxiety about your spending. That's the transformation we aim for with our top-tier program: Personalized Transformation Coaching.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Direct reassurance about transformation is best face-to-face.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Could show serene visuals, but direct testimony lands deeper

shots.rationale_a_roll: Direct reassurance about transformation is best face-to-face.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Could show serene visuals, but direct testimony lands deeper

shots.narrative: This is one-on-one support tailored just for you. We'll identify your triggers, create a step-by-step action plan, and work through emotional roadblocks together-so the changes you make aren't just temporary. They're permanent.

a_roll.shot_description: Host explains one-on-one aspect, direct to camera, empathetic smile

b_roll.shot_purpose: Show personal journey and permanence of change visually
b_roll.shot_description: Tight shots: video call, crossing off goals, writing action steps
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: List on paper, closeup: 'trigger' circled, 'DONE' on checklist

shot_data.narration_text: This is one-on-one support tailored just for you. We'll identify your triggers, create a step-by-step action plan, and work through emotional roadblocks together-so the changes you make aren't just temporary. They're permanent.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter explanation would be repetitive. Progress best depicted visually.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: B-roll of coaching, action plans, and journal breakthroughs tells the story with clarity.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Presenter explanation would be repetitive. Progress best depicted visually.
shots.rationale_b_roll: B-roll of coaching, action plans, and journal breakthroughs tells the story with clarity.

shots.narrative: This level is perfect for high-achievers, professionals, or anyone ready to invest in deep, meaningful change. Because when your mindset shifts, your life shifts. Experience personalized coaching for lasting financial freedom and emotional resilience.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Appeal to viewers ready for significant change
a_roll.shot_description: Host earnest, slight upward camera angle, invites change

b_roll.shot_description: Clients looking out windows, smiling with relief, supporting each other
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Montage: Success, open body posture, celebratory coffee toast

shot_data.narration_text: This level is perfect for high-achievers, professionals, or anyone ready to invest in deep, meaningful change. Because when your mindset shifts, your life shifts. Experience personalized coaching for lasting financial freedom and emotional resilience.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: High-achiever/personal growth remarks are authentic face-to-face.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Possible to use aspirational visuals but less impact than personal statement.

shots.rationale_a_roll: High-achiever/personal growth remarks are authentic face-to-face.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Possible to use aspirational visuals but less impact than personal statement.

shots.narrative: Maybe you're looking for support-but you don't want to go it alone. That's where our Empowerment Group Coaching comes in.

a_roll.shot_purpose: Invite viewers to community support, establish safety
a_roll.shot_description: Presenter smiling warmly, hands folded in open gesture to camera

b_roll.shot_description: Rows of video call boxes, diverse faces joining, friendly greetings
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Animated video grid, waves, digital connect icons

shot_data.narration_text: Maybe you're looking for support-but you don't want to go it alone. That's where our Empowerment Group Coaching comes in.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Friendly invite and supportive tone best conveyed by presenter.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Visual group shots build inclusion but presenter delivers initial warmth.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Friendly invite and supportive tone best conveyed by presenter.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Visual group shots build inclusion but presenter delivers initial warmth.

shots.narrative: You'll join a community of people who get it. Together, we'll share wins, tackle challenges, and celebrate breakthroughs. These aren't just 'support groups'-they're transformation hubs where real change happens.

a_roll.shot_description: Presenter emphasizes unity, glancing to offscreen group, friendly tone

b_roll.shot_description: Facilitated video call, digital high-fives, chat overlays, group smiles
b_roll.suggested_broll_visuals: Interactive chat bubbles, real-time emoji reactions, group applause

shot_data.narration_text: You'll join a community of people who get it. Together, we'll share wins, tackle challenges, and celebrate breakthroughs. These aren't just 'support groups'-they're transformation hubs where real change happens.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Abstract presenter discussion not as powerful as group visuals.
shot_data.rationale_b_roll: Group energy and celebration visually drive home the message.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Abstract presenter discussion not as powerful as group visuals.
shots.rationale_b_roll: Group energy and celebration visually drive home the message.

shots.narrative:
You'll realize you're not the only one struggling-and that realization? It's powerful. Because when we grow together, we grow stronger.

"I thought I was the only one. But hearing others' stories gave me the strength to face my own." - Emily, Former Client

Join a supportive community and transform your relationship with money.

a_roll.shot_description: Presenter quotes Emily sincerely, slight smile, voice softens

b_roll.shot_notes: Quote always visible, group scene fades out.
b_roll.shot_description: Overlay quote on dynamic group scene, Emilyâ€™s portrait, group reactions

shot_data.narration_text:
You'll realize you're not the only one struggling-and that realization? It's powerful. Because when we grow together, we grow stronger.

"I thought I was the only one. But hearing others' stories gave me the strength to face my own." - Emily, Former Client

shots.narrative: Or maybe you prefer to work at your own pace? That's exactly why I created the Self-Guided Freedom Program.

a_roll.shot_notes: Host sits beside laptop or tablet.
a_roll.shot_description: Host looks supportive, gestures to screen indicating program tools

b_roll.shot_description: Hands on keyboard, progress bar on laptop, cheerful lighting

shot_data.narration_text: Or maybe you prefer to work at your own pace? That's exactly why I created the Self-Guided Freedom Program.

shots.rationale_a_roll: Intro to self-guided tier best delivered by presenterâ€™s direct support.

shots.narrative: This interactive journey is packed with real-world strategies, exercises, and step-by-step modules designed to help you regain control-on your terms.

a_roll.shot_description: Host seated at computer, screen sharing demo of modules

b_roll.shot_description: Quick montage: modules checked, progress bars, excited fist pumps

shot_data.narration_text: This interactive journey is packed with real-world strategies, exercises, and step-by-step modules designed to help you regain control-on your terms.

shots.narrative:
This is perfect if you're motivated to create change independently but need the right tools to make it stick. You'll track your progress and celebrate your wins as you reach clear, definable goals.

Break free from compulsive spending-at your own pace.

This is perfect if you're motivated to create change independently but need the right tools to make it stick. You'll track your progress and celebrate your wins as you reach clear, definable goals.

shots.narrative: I know what it feels like to want change but not know where to start. This transformation journey isn't just about changing your spending habits-it's about reclaiming your peace of mind, rebuilding your confidence, and feeling proud of the progress you can see and feel in your everyday life.

a_roll.shot_description: Host leans close for direct empathic connection, soft background blur

b_roll.shot_notes: Quick, gentle transitions; maintain focus on hope.

b_roll.shot_description: Montage: journaling, quiet smiles, hugs, showing progress log

shot_data.narration_text: I know what it feels like to want change but not know where to start. This transformation journey isn't just about changing your spending habits-it's about reclaiming your peace of mind, rebuilding your confidence, and feeling proud of the progress you can see and feel in your everyday life.
shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Personal emotion, reassurance, and invitation are most effective from presenter.

shots.narrative: Once you understand why you spend, you unlock the power to change it-for good.

a_roll.shot_notes: Brief, sincere; subtle lighting shift for emphasis.
a_roll.shot_purpose: Impart sense of possibility and agency

shot_data.rationale_a_roll: Presenter drive home key takeaway best with direct address.

shots.narrative: I'm debt-free for the first time in years. I don't feel controlled by my impulses anymore. This program changed my life.

a_roll.shot_description: Host recounts client stories, sincere tone, smiles gently

b_roll.shot_notes: Quick, energetic edits; positive body language.

shot_data.narration_text: I'm debt-free for the first time in years. I don't feel controlled by my impulses anymore. This program changed my life.

shots.narrative:
So, what's the next step for you? One-on-one coaching, group support, or a self-guided journey-each path leads to freedom. The question is: Are you ready to take the first step?

Your future starts now. Take our free self-assessment or enroll in one of our programs today.

a_roll.shot_description: Confident tone, host gestures invitingly to graphic CTA buttons

b_roll.shot_notes: Ensure buttons appear clickable, overlays pop.

shot_data.narration_text:
So, what's the next step for you? One-on-one coaching, group support, or a self-guided journey-each path leads to freedom. The question is: Are you ready to take the first step?

Your future starts now. Take our free self-assessment or enroll in one of our programs today.
